title: Netflix Wants to Buy Warner Bros Movies and Shows
summary: Netflix is trying to buy parts of Warner Bros, a big company that makes movies and shows like Harry Potter and Game of Thrones. Netflix offered more money than other companies like Paramount. Paramount also wants to buy Warner Bros but says Netflix is getting special treatment. Experts say this deal could make Netflix very powerful, and government regulators might check it to make sure it's fair. The story is like a drama because these companies are fighting over who gets to buy Warner Bros.

background_read: This article talks about big companies in the entertainment world. Netflix is a streaming service where you can watch shows online. Warner Bros makes popular movies and TV series. When companies want to buy each other, they offer money, and sometimes they argue about it. Government regulators help make sure no company gets too powerful, so everyone can have fair choices in watching shows.
